'Description': 'Required. The name of the Icinga DB connection object. Defaults to icingadb.'
'Optional. Warning threshold for ongoing Redis dump duration. Applies if the value is higher than the threshold. Defaults to 5 minutes.'
'Optional. Critical threshold for ongoing Redis dump duration. Applies if the value is higher than the threshold. Defaults to 10 minutes.'
'Optional. Warning threshold for ongoing database sync duration. Applies if the value is higher than the threshold. Defaults to 5 minutes.'
'Optional. Critical threshold for ongoing database sync duration. Applies if the value is higher than the threshold. Defaults to 10 minutes.'
'Optional. Warning threshold for Redis write backlog. Applies if the value is higher than the threshold. Defaults to 5 minutes.'
'Optional. Critical threshold for Redis write backlog. Applies if the value is higher than the threshold. Defaults to 15 minutes.'
'Optional. Warning threshold for database sync backlog. Applies if the value is higher than the threshold. Defaults to 5 minutes.'
'Optional. Critical threshold for database sync backlog. Applies if the value is higher than the threshold. Defaults to 15 minutes.'
